headline: Tesla earnings, defense sector results, Fed comments: What to Watch
summary: Here's what investors will be watching on Tuesday, April 22. Tesla (TSLA) reports first quarter earnings results after the closing bell on Wall Street. Yahoo Finance's special coverage of Tesla earnings kicks off at 4:00 p.m. on Tuesday. The defense sector will also be releasing earnings reports, including from RTX (RTX), Lockheed Martin (LMT), and Northrop Grumman (NOC). The market will get fresh commentary from Federal Reserve officials, including Philadelphia Fed president Patrick Harker, Minneapolis Fed president Neel Kashkari, and Richmond Fed president Tom Barkin. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
